MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA24 postcode area of Dalry. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.16AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of grounded overhead line equipment near Cockenzie and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11.28AM on 14 March 2021.
